name: Schroeder Nordholt
what_you_do: Schroeder is a seasoned music educator, producer & performer. His career spans over 25 years, during which he's helped countless individuals access their musical potential, produced across multiple music genres, composed for film & tv, served in musical theater as music director, voice coach and accompanist, and performed far and wide in numerous bands and as a sought-after piano bar entertainer.
social_proof: Over the years he's appeared on the better part of 1000 stages, and shared the stage with coaching and personal development leaders such as Sean D. Stewart and Les Brown.
business_focus: Schroeder is a seasoned music educator, producer & performer who runs a signature voice coaching program called Mic Drop.
service_provided: voice coaching, music education, music production, music performance
